name: Music_4048.wav
caption: This is a mantra/meditation music piece. There is a male vocalist in the lead that is singing in a chant-like manner. The flute is playing a calming tune. There is an electronic sound effect that gives a texture of vibration in the background. A bass guitar can be heard playing notes every now and then. There is an immersive atmosphere to this piece. It could be playing in the background of a meditation video. It could also be played as an accompaniment piece for meditation courses.
